headline: Lockheed Martin (LMT): Assessing Valuation After a Recent Share Price Sentiment Reset
summary: Lockheed Martin (LMT) has quietly pushed higher in recent sessions, outpacing the broader defense sector even as year to date returns remain negative. This invites a closer look at what the market is pricing in. See our latest analysis for Lockheed Martin. That recent 7 day share price return of 4.50% looks more like a sentiment reset than a full trend change, given the share price is still down 3.19% year to date and the 1 year total shareholder return sits in mildly negative territory. If...
